title: [GAMEPLAY] Can't recall back to base.
body: I can't recall back to base. Recall is disabled.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Which map are you experiencing this on? (Silly question, but if you're on ARAM, you won't actually recall back to base, the animation will just play.)
Experienced this on Rift, Rank. Now I can recall back home again, thank you.
